excerpt: Chase distant horizons and tame wild frontiers. Conquer the spacelanes with tactics and skill. Support the troops, or your local outlaws, it's up to you. The Praetorian Pack enables you to carve out your own niche in the universe. With a plethora of career and commercially-minded ships at your disposal, you'll command the skies with steely aplomb. In whatever way you see fit.

Crush your enemies with extreme prejudice and ruthless efficiency when you scramble this bellicose fleet. With a staunch selection of combat-focused ships, from shifty light fighters, to hard-hitting specialized warbirds, a number of support ships, and the mighty Idris-P, the Dominus Pack enables an impressive and resolute show of force, whenever the need arises.

Rock through the night with this rugged convocation of haulers, maulers, and shot-callers. With abundant firepower and rigs of every size, you can crash the gate without worrying about any unwanted intervention as you roll this truckin' convoy across the 'verse.

Instantly bolster your fleet with an imposing collection of ships and vehicles befitting a Grand Admiral. Featuring 30 vessels, a full complement of hangar decorations and campaign skins, LTI, and 20,000 UEC starting money at launch, the Provectus pack provides a vast and versatile armada from the universe’s top ship manufacturers.

chinese_excerpt: 当您想象一个帅气的赏金猎人在敌方星系独自打拼时，您就会联想到仙女座。仙女座是一艘在目前的RSI产品线中最受欢迎的多人货船。仙女座深受走私者和商人们的喜爱，因为它是模组化的，强有力的等等...以及它彻头彻尾的标志性外形。仙女座有着载人炮塔，大容量的货舱和一个小型的飞行甲板发射寄生战机用于防御。
excerpt: When you think handsome bounty hunter making his own way in a galaxy of enemies, you think the Constellation. The Constellation, a multi-person freighter, is the most popular ship in RSI’s current production array. Constellations are beloved by smugglers and merchants alike because they are modular, high powered… and just downright iconic-looking. The Constellation includes a manned turret, a large cargo area and a small flight deck capable of launching a snub fighter in its own defense.

excerpt: The Taurus is the dedicated freighter of RSI’s iconic Constellation series, fully configurable but without all the bells and whistles. Perfect for pilots looking to pull out all the stops and streamline their cargo hauling operation, or captains just get acquainted with multicrew vessels.

chinese_excerpt: 如果说大黄蜂幽灵是为了隐藏自己，那么大黄蜂追踪者就是为了寻找目标。F7C-R追踪者搭载了先进的雷达系统，令其成为在扫描操作中要求精度的深度的深空探索者的理想之选。地方的民兵和大型佣兵组织会使用追踪者来作为他们的移动指挥船。
excerpt: If the Ghost is made to hide, the Tracker is made to seek. The F7C-R Tracker boasts an advanced radar suite making it ideal for deep-space explorers who require depth and accuracy in their scan packages. Local militia and larger merc units will also repurpose Trackers to act as mobile C&C ships for their squadrons.

chinese_excerpt: 不用向任何人报告，砍掉中间人，将谨慎抛诸脑后，像专业人士一样撕开残骸，在虚空中开辟您的天地，这便是德雷克星际的单人打捞船--秃鹫。现在购买秃鹫将会在可飞前借出一艘勘探者作为替代。在您与德雷克一起携手共进前，先来体验下独狼的生活吧。
excerpt: Answer to no one, cut out the middleman and throw caution to the wind. Rip wrecks apart like a pro and carve out your own place in the big empty with the help of Drake Interplanetary’s one-man salvage monster. Pledging for the Vulture now secures a MISC Prospector in its stead til the ship is flight ready. Get a taste of the lone wolf lifestyle before going all in with Drake.

chinese_excerpt: 弩炮自行防空系统可容纳10枚导弹，让其能大闹一场。任何鲁莽闯入其半径2000m范围内的飞船将被这些导弹撕开护盾，重创船体甚至被当场抹杀。无论是在前线歼敌还是防御前哨站点，弩炮向来可以主宰战场。
excerpt: Accommodating ten guided missiles, the Ballista self-propelled air defense system is capable of destruction on a massive scale. Chew through shields, incapacitate or obliterate airborne threats of almost any class foolhardy enough to come within 2000 meters. Whether its pummeling enemies on the frontlines or watching over a strategic post, the Ballista won't just level the playing field, it'll level the competition.

chinese_excerpt: 自由枪骑兵-DUR变体专门用于探索。它牺牲了25%的货舱空间，换取了一个加强的跳跃驱动器，一个更先进的扫描仪以及扩容的燃料箱。对于一些人来说这些改装似乎并不好，但是对于那些重视探索而非赚钱的人来说，自由枪骑兵-DUR绝对是他们的不二选择。
excerpt: The Freelancer DUR variant specializes in exploration. Sacrificing 25% cargo capacity of the standard Freelancer for an enhanced jump drive, a more advanced scanner, and an expanded fuel tank may seem like a bad call to some, but those who value discovery over profit will find it to be their ship of choice.

chinese_excerpt: 红弯刀内置了一个标准的货运空间和一个十分完善的医疗设施，并且还配备了智能医生。这辆星际救护车装备了领航E7(Nav-E7)回波转发器，一具长距离扫描仪，以及一个可靠的对接口，令其成为了搜救任务的理想选择。该型号拥有独特的红十字涂装。
excerpt: The Cutlass Red takes Drake’s classic chassis and converts the standard cargo hold into a fully-equipped medical bay, complete with AutoDoc integration, and easy-access via port and starboard entry points. The gun turret is replaced by a Nav-E7 Echo Scanner, equipped with flexible long-range radar and a beacon, with the added nuance of manual manipulation, putting any search and rescue operation into your capable hands.

Avast! Live outside the law with this fearsome fighter, the Drake Interplanetary Cutlass. Become the scourge of the spacelanes as you make your living picking off transports and shipping contraband.

The Hornet is the civilian version of the F7A Hornet flown off of the elite Bengal carrier vanguard of the UEE Navy. While not outfitted for long range runs, the Hornet can take her share of hits… and dish out a consistent, powerful response. The Hornet may be uglier than anything from Origin’s lineup, but pilots love them for their rugged reliability.

MISC is known for producing efficient, modular, middle-of-the-road ships, primarily transports of different sizes. Freelancers are used as long haul merchant ships by major corporations, but they are just as frequently repurposed as dedicated exploration vessels by independent captains who want to operate on the fringes of the galaxy. Don’t let some of the alien technology in the cockpit surprise you: the Freelancer’s design owes several of its internal systems to a lend-lease deal with the Xi’An.

The Buccaneer has been designed from the ground up to fly and fight the way you live. No leather interiors or hyperpillows here: the ‘Bucc is a scrapper designed to maneuver and fight above its weight class. This rough-and-tumble frontier fighter can be maintained in the worst of conditions in order to keep real, working space crews alive.

Built on Anvil’s popular Atlas Platform, the Centurion presents a tactical solution for short-range anti-aircraft operations. Dominate any combat zone by assuring immediate threats from above are dealt with quickly and efficiently, thanks to the Centurion’s custom energy-based AA turret.

Crusader Industries brings its usual commitment to excellence directly to the civilian market with the C1 Spirit, a mid-size multi-purpose starship built for cargo transport and delivery but packing enough versatility to tackle multiple roles and unpredictable jobs.
Avast! Live outside the law with this fearsome fighter, the Drake Interplanetary Cutlass. Become the scourge of the spacelanes as you make your living picking off transports and shipping contraband.

What do you get for the Citizen who has everything?

The Star Citizen gift cards make a great last-minute holiday gift for your friends and family. Let the newcomers choose the perfect game package that’s fit for them, and let experienced backer get that one ship upgrade they had their eye on for weeks…

When you buy a Star Citizen Gift Card, you’ll be able to send it as a gift through your My Hangar section. Please note that if this is the first purchase on your account, there is a 30 day waiting period before the gift can be sent to another account.

Star Citizen Gift Cards must be exchanged for Store Credit from their recipient’s My Hangar section.

Take on the ‘verse in Consolidated Outland’s Nomad, a ship built to let solo pilots express themselves while exploring the galaxy on their own terms.

With the versatility of a medium-sized multi-purpose freighter packed into a stylish, compact frame, the Consolidated Outland Nomad is the model of self-sufficiency, the spirit of the open sky, and the perfect solution for anyone yearning to start a brand-new adventure.

Collecting all commercially available paint options for Crusader’s class-defining Hercules starlifter chassis, your fleet will stand out with access to the classic Draco, Cerberus, Frostbite, and Timberline paint schemes, along with three all-new liveries - the woodsy Dryad, no-nonsense Sylvan, and lustrous Argent paint schemes.

These paints are compatible with all Hercules variants.

The Gladius is an older design which has been updated over the years to keep up with modern technology. In military circles, the Gladius is beloved for its performance and its simplicity. A fast, light fighter with a laser-focus on dogfighting, the Gladius is an ideal interceptor or escort ship.

Unmatched design, blazing top speed, and ultra-responsive maneuverability make the Arrow the most agile scrapper in its class. And, a robust weapons package provides firepower to spare. This is truly the classic light fighter updated for the next generation of combat.

Start your adventure today and launch into the Persistent Universe with your Anvil Arrow. Snagging this pack also lets you experience a taste of intense dogfighting and FPS action with two distinct multiplayer game modes: Arena Commander and Star Marine.

Of MISC’s ubiquitous Hull series, the Hull A sports the slightest frame, serving as an ultra-accessible point of entry into the world of big-time hauling. Sporting the same telescoping spindle system as its larger siblings and capable of pushing a significant 64 SCU when running at capacity, the Hull A is perfect for intrepid solo couriers looking to strike out into the galaxy and turbocharge their careers.

The Drake Herald is a small, armored ship designed to safely get information from Point A to Point B. Featuring a powerful central engine (for high speed transit and generating the power needed for effective data encryption/containment), advanced encryption software and an armored computer core, theHerald is unique among personal spacecraft in that it is designed to be easily ‘cleaned’ when in danger of capture.
Stock up your personal armory with a collection of armor sets from Quirinus Tech and RRS, as well as the matching sniper rifles from Gemini and Behring.

With the versatility of a medium-sized multi-purpose freighter packed into a stylish, compact frame, the Consolidated Outland Nomad is the model of self-sufficiency, the spirit of the open sky, and the perfect solution for anyone yearning to start a brand-new adventure.

Unmatched design, blazing top speed, and ultra-responsive maneuverability make the Arrow the most agile scrapper in its class. And, a robust weapons package provides firepower to spare. This is truly the classic light fighter updated for the next generation of combat.

At Greycat, we understand that mining isn't a one-size-fits-all operation, so we designed the ROC-DS to be as hard-working and versatile as the miners who use it. With more than double the ore capacity of the standard ROC, and a dedicated boom seat for manual laser operation, the ROC-DS makes big jobs manageable. Its the perfect compliment to any mining enterprise, from full-scale digs to fledgling operations. Whatever the task, with Greycat, mining duos now have the right tool to comfortably collect more ore.

It can be a rough galaxy out there, but that doesn’t mean you have to sacrifice style or comfort. With an advanced weapons loadout and a custom targeting system from WillsOP, the 325a can come out on top of any dogfight and look good doing it.

Prepare to chart distant horizons with Origin’s legendary 315p solo explorer. With a more robust power plant than its 300 series comrades, and custom scanning package designed exclusively for the ship by Chimera Communications, the 315p sets itself apart.

english_title: Mustang Alpha Star Citizen + Squadron 42 Combo

The MISC Reliant series is the most accessible way for you and a co-pilot to access the universe and its adventures. The Kore has the most cargo space of the range and is best suited to in-system delivery and local hauling. MISC recently refreshed the whole Reliant range, giving all ships two size-three missile racks. However, the Kore also benefits from an additional twin gimbal mount to bring its offensive abilities closer to the skirmisher of the range, the Tana.

Get it there fast and look good doing it. The 135c features increased cargo capacity, and innovative in-house engineering that makes it among the most fuel-efficient and eco-friendly ships on the market. Capable of long-distance flights that most ships of its size aren’t equipped for, the 135c is perfect for solo pilots looking to turn heads without sacrificing functionality or reliability.

Tour the universe with the perfect coupling of luxury and performance. The 100 series features Origin Jumpworks' patented AIR fuel system, making them the most fuel-efficient and eco-friendly ships on the market. Capable of long distance flights that most ships of this size aren't equipped for, the 100 series is perfect for solo pilots looking to turn heads without sacrificing functionality or reliability.

An ex-police cruiser spacecraft, the Avenger is a powerful platform for Bounty Hunters to build their fortunes with. Featuring a rugged spaceframe and plenty of customization options, the Avenger is a great choice for someone who doesn't want the flash of the 300 Series.

english_title: Anvil C8X Pisces Expedition - Starter Pack
excerpt:
Enhancing the standard C8 explorer with added firepower and a limited-edition livery, the C8X Expedition turns a stout snub into a capable stand-alone vessel, ideal for exploring tight spots and unique environments inaccessible to larger ships. 

Start your adventure today and launch into the Persistent Universe in your C8X Pisces Expedition. Snagging this pack also lets you experience a taste of intense dogfighting and FPS action with two distinct multiplayer game modes: Arena Commander and Star Marine.

Risks were meant to be taken, but why risk being outgunned when it matters most? The 125a features a rear-mounted missile rack, and innovative in-house engineering that makes it among the most fuel-efficient and eco-friendly ships on the market. Capable of long-distance flights that most ships of its size aren’t equipped for, the 125a is perfect for solo pilots looking to turn heads without sacrificing functionality or reliability.

If you’re going to travel the stars… why not do it in style? The 300i is Origin Jumpworks’ premiere luxury spacecraft is a sleek, silver killer that sends as much of a message with its silhouette as it does with its particle cannons. Some have accused Origin of putting style over substance and inflating the sticker price to match… but at heart the 300i is still an elegant dogfighter’s tool.
Outfit your Redeemer for any occasion with this five paint bundle, from the striking metallic orange and black Valencia to the Scrubland Camo.

Consolidated Outland’s design and engineering teams have managed to tweak and refine the Mustang into an admirable racer. The end result, the Mustang Gamma, has smooth acceleration, and power on demand thanks to an innovative package featuring three powerful Magma Jet engines for maximum thrust.
With a potent combination of speed, maneuverability, and rugged durability, the Cyclone is a perfect choice for local deliveries and transport between planetside homesteads and outposts.

The Greycat Industrial Remote Ore Collector (ROC) is a specialized mining vehicle with a rock-solid reputation for ease and ability. Much faster than mining by hand but without the excess power of a mining ship, it’s the ideal way to excavate in-atmosphere and move your enterprise forward.

Lacking the Prisoner Cells of the Stalker or the EMP Generator of the Warlock, the Titan’s hold is free to carry cargo. Couple that available space with the Avenger’s tried and true combat abilities and you’ve got a light cargo hauler that’s more than capable of handling itself in a fight.

Star Citizen Gift Cards must be exchanged for Store Credit from their recipient’s My Hangar section.

Answer the call and join the United Empire of Earth's most elite pilots in this cinematic sci-fi adventure from acclaimed developer Chris Roberts. Embark on an epic single-player campaign across the Star Citizen universe, featuring intense combat, an engrossing story and an all-star cast including Mark Hamill, Gary Oldman and Gillian Anderson. This pledge includes immediate access to Arena Commander and Star Marine.

Enhancing the standard C8 explorer with added firepower and a limited-edition livery, the C8X Expedition turns a stout snub into a capable stand-alone vessel, ideal for exploring tight spots and unique environments inaccessible to larger ships.

They call Mules stubborn, but we say they just don’t know when to quit. The Drake Mule is your go-to workhorse for all sort of loading and hauling jobs, a six-wheeled beast of burden that’s always determined to execute the mission at hand. Whether you need to transport cargo over the roughest terrain possible or load it into larger vessels and cargo decks, the Mule works. Plain and simple.
